title: Cyberpunk Synthwave Industrial Music
description: 10 tracks in the vibe of futuristic cyberpunk with fat bass, industrial sound fx and big drums in 2 versions - with tail and loopable.
longDescription:
NEUROVERSE | Cyberpunk Synthwave Industrial Music

by Wiktoria Zac


LISTEN NOW


 This music pack contains 10 music tracks in two variations (10 full with tail and 10 seamless loops, which gives 20 tracks total). Designed for Cyberpunk, Sci-Fi, Futuristic Worlds, RPGs, and everything in between! Also best for promotional purposes. The tracks have been created using the best quality tools and techniques.


 The pack includes:

  ➼ 10 Professionally mastered original tracks in two variations

 ➼ Minutes of audio: full 29 min 16 sec | seamless loops 28 min 33 sec

 ➼ CD quality 24/44.1 kHz .wav format 


 TRACKLIST (44.1kHz, 24bit, Stereo)

▶ Codebreakers | full mix - 2:28 | loop - 2:25

▶ Neon Dreamscape | full mix - 3:07 | loop - 3:02

▶ Streetwalker | full mix - 3:11 | loop - 3:07

▶ AlterEgo | full mix - 2:51 | loop - 2:48

▶ ShadowTech Syndicate | full mix - 2:12 | loop - 2:10

▶ Reality Shift | full mix - 3:13 | loop - 3:07

▶ Protocol Zero | full mix - 2:59 | loop - 2:53

▶ M Factory | full mix - 3:05 | loop - 3:00

▶ Blue Powder| full mix - 2:58 | loop - 2:53

▶ Final Transmission | full mix - 3:12 | loop - 3:08


If you're looking for original music for your project, feel free to reach out to me at wiktoriazac@gmail.com
